class.name: LargeTexture
class.brief_description: A Texture capable of storing many smaller Textures with offsets.
class.description: A Texture capable of storing many smaller Textures with offsets. You can dynamically add pieces(Textures) to this fLargeTexture] using different offsets.

method.name: add_piece
method.description: Add another [Texture] to this [LargeTexture], starting on offset "ofs".

method.name: get_piece_count
method.description: Return the number of pieces currently in this [LargeTexture].

method.name: get_piece_offset
method.description: Return the offset of the piece with index "idx".

method.name: get_piece_texture
method.description: Return the [Texture] of the piece with index "idx".

method.name: set_piece_offset
method.description: Set the offset of the piece with index "idx" to "ofs".

method.name: set_piece_texture
method.description: Set the [Texture] of the piece with index "idx" to "ofs".
